attributes.additional_details: "As long as but a hundred of us remain alive, never will we on any conditions be brought under English rule. It is in truth not for glory, nor riches, nor honours, that we are fighting, but for freedom - for that alone, which no honest man gives up but with life itself".
attributes.background:
Scotland and England are heading in very different political directions! 
England's use of Scotland is no longer bearable.
Let us go!
